content.text: I am not sure how to fit in with people my age because I didn't have much social interaction when I was younger.
I feel the same way. I did not go to college because I run the family farm.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go running and spend time with my family.
I like to run too! I also like to express my style through my fashion.
That's nice. I'm angry at my coworker. I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.
That sounds fun! I like Taylor Swift.
What are you looking forward to?
My new home will be a place where I can express my creativity and individuality, and where I can feel safe and comfortable.
